name: ControlChaos - MC Hackathon 2022
description:
Description

This is my project which I created for the MC Hackathon in February 2022. 

The theme is contrast and control. 

This is represented by the white surroundings becoming increasingly polluted by little black devils. What is just a simple disposal at the beginning quickly gets out of control as more and more devils appear. The climax comes when night falls and the devils pick up speed. 

Can you keep the board pure white and clean? 

Project Video

I am a solo developer- My name is Joris, you can contact me here:
Email: joris.grau2@gmail.com

Packages and/or Technologies
Unity
Unity XR-InteractionToolkit
Blender

Project files can be found here: https://github.com/JorGra/CandC
